conversation.content: I want to find a bra that offers both comfort and support, tailored to my specific body type and needs. within my expected price range: [18.99, 20.78]

Based on your budget range, I recommend the Bali Lace Desire Underwire Bra. It offers comfort, support, and a pretty look with a plunging neckline. The price is $21.99. If you decide to purchase this bra, I also recommend considering the potentially purchasable item: <Bali Lace Desire Underwire Bra, Full-Coverage Lace Bra with Underwire Cups, Plunging Underwire Bra for Everyday Comfort> (B09LRG65LD) which fits your criteria perfectly.
